name: vscode-number-peeker
description: Hover over number in VSCode and quickly see alternative representations

number-peeker.enabled.markdownDescription: Whether this extension should be enabled (work). This setting is here, whenever you want to temporally disable this extension without removing it.

number-peeker.match-against.whole-number.markdownDescription: Whether to match whenever user hovers over whole number.

number-peeker.match-against.binary-numbe.markdownDescription: Whether to match whenever user hovers over binary number.

number-peeker.match-against.hex-numbers.markdownDescription: Whether to match whenever user hovers over hexadecimal number.

number-peeker.match-against.decimal-numb.markdownDescription: Whether to match whenever user hovers over decimal number.

number-peeker.match-against.exponential-.markdownDescription: Whether to match whenever user hovers over exponential number (scientific notation).

number-peeker.decimal.show.markdownDescription: Whether to show decimal representation on hover

number-peeker.binary.show.markdownDescription: Whether to show binary representation on hover

number-peeker.binary.showUnsignedWhenPos.markdownDescription: Whether to show usigned representation whenever user hovers over positive number

number-peeker.binary.showI8WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 8 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.binary.showI16WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 16 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.binary.showI32WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 32 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.binary.showI64WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 64 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.binary.showI128WhenPossibl.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 128 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.binary.showSmallestPossibl.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed smallest possible representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.binary.showWarningWhenNumb.markdownDescription: Whether to show warning that number is outside of the supported range of numbers (currently signed 128 bit int / i128)

number-peeker.binary.splitNumbersEveryN.markdownDescription: How many numbers to should be in one group, before getting split by space. If you don't want to split every N characters, just set this value really high, like 99999.. If you don't want to split every N characters, just set this value really high, like 99999 (and set number-peeker.binary.padding to false!). Defaults to 5

number-peeker.binary.padding.markdownDescription: Whether to add padding (zeros -- '0') to splitted binary numbers

number-peeker.hex.show.markdownDescription: Whether to show hexadecimal representation on hover

number-peeker.hex.showUnsignedWhenPossib.markdownDescription: Whether to show usigned representation whenever user hovers over positive number

number-peeker.hex.showI8WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 8 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.hex.showI16WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 16 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.hex.showI32WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 32 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.hex.showI64WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 64 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.hex.showI128WhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed 128 bit representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.hex.showSmallestPossibleRe.markdownDescription: Whether to show signed smallest possible representation whenever user hovers over negative number

number-peeker.hex.showWarningWhenNumberO.markdownDescription: Whether to show warning that number is outside of the supported range of numbers (currently signed 128 bit int / i128)

number-peeker.hex.showUpercased.markdownDescription: Whether to show hexadecimal characters uppercased

number-peeker.hex.trimTrailingFs.markdownDescription: Whether to trim trailing Fs from hex numbers

number-peeker.hex.prependZeroWhenPossibl.markdownDescription: When hex number contains only one place, prepend zero, just to make it prettier :D

number-peeker.hex.show0xBeforeHex.markdownDescription: Show '0x' before hex numbers, just to make it prettier :D

number-peeker.exponential.show.markdownDescription: Show exponential representation of the number.

number-peeker.exponential.maximumNumberO.markdownDescription: Number of fraction digits in inclusive range of 0-20. Defaults to 5

number-peeker.exponential.showNotationLo.markdownDescription: Whether to show scientific notation lowercased

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
